name: Dani Vargas
coverLetter:
Dear HR Department,

I have only worked for dispensaries in Los Angeles including DC Collective and ShowGrow as a budtender. I have an innate passion for medicinal uses of plants such as marijuana and have implemented my interests into my studies-I am currently studying Botany and Greenhouse management. I am eager to use my skills and experience in the medical marijuana industry. 

I would like to point out my strong ability to interact with people and evaluate information to develop plans and programs geared to improving profitability. Excellent organization and planning skills allow me to choose priorities successfully and implement activities tailored to meeting specifications and deadlines. Well-developed communication skills enhance my ability to quickly establish effective and persuasive rapport with individuals of diverse backgrounds. With over two yearsâ€™ experience in the ocean freight forwarding industry, five years in the finance sector, six years of administrative work, and over 10 years in customer service, my complete array of qualification makes me an ideal candidate to help your company achieve its present and future goals.I would appreciate the opportunity to discuss with you, how my qualifications meet your needs. Thank you for your time and consideration, I look forward to hearing from you soon. 
 
Sincerely,
 
Dani Vargas
